wisdom.sentence: A Thaum is the basic unit of magical strength.It has been universally established as the amount of magic needed to create one small white pigeon or three normal sized billiard balls.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett, "The Light Fantastic"

wisdom.sentence: An ancient proverb summed it up: when a wizard is tired of looking for broken glass in his dinner, it ran, he is tired of life.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett, "The Light Fantastic"

wisdom.sentence: Chaos is King and Magic is loose in the world.
"Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for you are crunchy and good with ketchup."
Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law.
wisdom.author: Aleister Crowley

wisdom.sentence: Knowledge is power -- knowledge shared is power lost.
wisdom.author: Aleister Crowley

wisdom.sentence: Magic is always the best solution -- especially reliable magic.
No matter how subtle the wizard, a knife in the shoulder blades will seriously cramp his style.
Somewhere, just out of sight, the unicorns are gathering.
The default Magic Word, "Abracadabra", actually is a corruption of the Hebrew phrase "ha-Bracha dab'ra" which means "pronounce the blessing".
"The first rule of magic is simple.  Don't waste your time waving your hands and hoping when a rock or a club will do."
wisdom.author: McCloctnik the Lucid

wisdom.sentence: Using words to describe magic is like using a screwdriver to cut roast beef.
wisdom.author: Tom Robbins

wisdom.sentence: What is a magician but a practising theorist?
wisdom.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

wisdom.sentence: What use is magic if it can't save a unicorn?
wisdom.author: Peter S. Beagle, "The Last Unicorn"
